title: Eco-friendly hydroxyapatite and emerging MXenes for uranium adsorptive uptake
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00849E, Critical Review
Hongjuan Liu, Tianyu Fu, Ziying Cao, Yuanbing Mao
Hydroxyapatite and MXenes are potentially ideal adsorbents for uranium as a nuclear contaminant possessing radioactivity and chemical toxicity.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
